name: ObjectCart
short_description: ObjectCart is gui-less e-commerce library written in PHP5 with PEAR. The goal is to provide a set of objects that abstract and implement e-commerce store functionality, having the gui creativly built elsewhere using ObjectCart's higher-level APIs.
